title: Promote greater mindfulness with Groodles’ art therapy exercises, now only $39.99
content:
Macworld

Feeling more stressed lately? Tired of being unable to express your feelings effectively? Art therapy can promote stress relief and offer a healthy outlet for your emotions, and now, you can access non-clinical art therapy on your iPad or Mac, thanks to Groodles.

Groodles is an app that brings art therapy to your fingertips, and now, lifetime access is only $39.99 (reg. $149). Regular use can help users process their emotions, enhance their mental well-being, and even foster a more positive outlook.

Groodles offers art therapy exercises to help alleviate stress and release your emotions. Stimulate your creativity with the app, and enjoy access to hundreds of original artworks that you can reference.

The app also focuses on holistic themes like anxiety and body positivity to ensure you can be introspective in various areas of your life. Journaling is also an option, with morning and nighttime exercises available.

Other features Groodles offers are unique, hand-drawn badges for tracking progress, landscape and portrait resolutions, audio instructions, and a robust and supportive community, among other perks.

With regular use of Groodles, you might uncover hidden parts of yourself, boost your self-esteem, and even promote greater positive outlooks on life.

Experience greater mindfulness and stress alleviation with lifetime access to Groodles Unlimited’s art therapy exercises, now just $39.99 for a limited time.
